thread.section_title: TinyDeal 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 TinyDeal 的点评意见 | www.tinydeal.com
thread.title: Tom Mo
thread.title_full: TinyDeal 的点评人 Tom Mo

author: Tom Mo
title: Tom Mo
text: TinyDeal is a trust worthy company who deals with orders promptly. The follow up procedure is excellent with a number of emails regarding the progress of the packing, shipping etc. If you have questions regarding your order, just send them emails and that would be dealt with in the shortest time. Generally speaking I consider their services excellent.
